name: Power Clusters (6×2 @ ~90%)
time_per_session_breakdown: 6 sets x 2 reps with short intra-set rest (~20s)
rest_pause: yes (very short rest between reps or doubles)
overview_and_execution: Load ~90% 1RM. Perform 2 reps, rack for 15-20s, do 2 more, etc. Typically 6 total reps or multiple sets (6×2) with ~2 min rest between sets. Clusters let you handle heavier weight for more explosive reps.
example_application: Cluster squat: 6 sets of 2 reps with 2 min between sets. Or do 2 reps, rack 15s, 2 reps, rack 15s, etc. for a single cluster ‘set.’
important_notes: Improves power near max loads without excessive fatigue. Keep technique crisp. Good for advanced lifters.
